page.title: 09Education Droxford School
page.content: Village child pop.16 and under risen to over 100.Playgroup for under 5's meets Tues & Thurs.Lots of equipment. 7 girls 3 boys,Â£1.20 for 3 hours. {Droxford}County Primary Sch. on 4 acre site on edge of downs.Remodelled 1980s 1 class now inside roof above another. Head plus 4.2 teachers,116 children 5_11 in 4 classes.Typical primary curriculum:_English,Maths,Art,Craft,PE Music,R.E,Integrated Studies this term communications,toys games & pastimes costume.4th Year oral French.Some piano and violin.Meonstoke and Newtown 1st Sch.s send children at 8+. All children stay to lunch 1/3 have school meals.Sports and musical events shared with other local schools.Some pupils travel by bus.At 11+ children go to Swanmore Sec. school.PSA Bonfire and firework party 5 Nov shared by village {Adult}Education classes begin Sept.
